name: Grendel
description: Grendel sees every battlefield as a smorgasbord. His insatiable appetite rewards him with high survivability. Enemies will be eaten. And regurgitated.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Swallow enemies whole and store them in Grendel's gut. Hold to vomit out stored enemies, covering them in toxic bile.

abilities.name: Nourish
abilities.description: Regenerate health as Grendel absorbs nourishment from enemies in his gut. While he digests, enemies that attack or are attacked by Grendel suffer <DT_VIRAL_COLOR>Viral Damage and energy sources provide more energy. These buffs extend to squad mates.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: Grendel curls into a ball. He heals over time as he rolls, knocking over anyone in his path. Jumping slams Grendel into the ground and generates a damaging shockwave.

abilities.name: Regurgitate
abilities.description: Violently puke out a bile soaked enemy from Grendel's gut, turning the consumed into a toxic projectile. Nearby enemies are slowed and have their armor dissolved by the bile.

languages.description: Grendel betrachtet jedes Schlachtfeld als Buffet. Sein unersättlicher Hunger belohnt ihn mit hoher Überlebensfähigkeit. Feinde werden verspeist. Und hervorgewürgt.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Grendel voit chaque champ de bataille comme un buffet. Son appétit insatiable le récompense avec une grande capacité de survie. Les ennemis seront mangés. Et régurgités.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Grendel vede ogni campo di battaglia come un buffet. Il suo appetito insaziabile lo ricompensa con un'elevata capacità di sopravvivenza. I nemici saranno mangiati. E rigurgitati.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: 그 어떤 전장이라도 그렌델의 눈에는 뷔페 만찬상으로 비칩니다. 결코 채울 수 없는 그의 식욕은 높은 생존력이라는 형태의 보상으로 돌아오며, 적을 먹어치우고, 또한 게워낼 수도 있습니다.
languages.name: 그렌델

languages.description: Grendel ve cada campo de batalla como una mezcla heterogénea. Su apetito insaciable lo recompensa con una alta capacidad de supervivencia. Los enemigos serán devorados. Y regurgitados.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Grendel 将每个战场都视为大杂烩。他贪得无厌的胃口使他具有很高的生存能力。敌人会被吃掉，然后被吐出。
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Каждое поле битвы Грендель воспринимает как шведский стол. Его ненасытный аппетит вознаграждает его высокой живучестью. Враги будут просто съедены. И отрыгнуты.
languages.name: Грендель

languages.description: Grendelにとって戦場はバイキングである。彼の飽くなき食欲は敵を食らい、彼の血肉となり耐久性を上げる。
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Dla Grendela, pole bitwy jest otwartym bufetem. Swoją wysoką wytrzymałość zawdzięcza on swojemu nienasyconemu apetytowi. Wrogowie zostaną pożarci. I zwróceni.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: O Grendel vê cada campo de batalha como um bufê. Seu apetite insaciável o recompensa com grande capacidade de sobrevivência. Os inimigos serão devorados e regurgitados.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Grendel 將每場戰鬥都視為自助餐。他貪得無厭的胃口使他具有很高的生存能力。敵人會被吃掉。然後被吐掉。
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Grendel มองเห็นสนามรบทุกแห่งหนเป็นเหมือนที่จัดเลี้ยงบุฟเฟ่ต์ ความอยากอาหารที่ไม่รู้จักพอทำให้มีความสามารถในการเอาตัวรอดได้ดี ศัตรูจะถูกกลืนกินเข้าไป แล้วค่อยสำรอกออกมา
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Grendel her savaş alanını açık büfe olarak görür. Doyumsuz iştahı, onu büyük bir hayatta kalma yeteneği ile ödüllendirir. Düşmanlarını yer, ve onları kusar.
languages.name: Grendel

languages.description: Вічний ненажера. Ґрендель дивиться на кожне бойовище як на стіл із закусками. Вічний голод забезпечує його потужною живучістю. Він зжере ворога. А потім відригне.
languages.name: Ґрендель
